channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Scale DAS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Scale DAS

item.title: CVE-2022-22411|2024-08-03T03:14:54.950Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale%20das
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale Data Access Services (DAS) 5.1.3.1 could allow an authenticated user to insert code which could allow the attacker to manipulate cluster resources due to excessive permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 223016.
